# PrintCommand

**Extends:** [ESCBaseCommand](../ESCBaseCommand) < [Resource](../Resource)

## Description

`print string`

Prints a message to the Godot debug window.
Use this for debugging game state.

**Parameters**

- *string*: The string to log

@ESC
